{/* Hero Section */}

India's Most Secure Ticket Resale Marketplace

Buy and sell tickets with confidence. Fastpass ensures a safe, modern, and user-friendly experience for all live events.

Browse Events List Your Tickets
{/* How It Works */}

How It Works

{tab === 'Buy Tickets' && (
Browse & Discover
Find tickets to your favorite events with ease. Our platform offers a wide selection of verified tickets, ensuring a smooth and secure purchase process.
Secure Purchase
Got extra tickets? Resell them securely on Fastpass. Our platform connects you with buyers, ensuring a hassle-free and safe transaction.
Enjoy the Event
For high-demand events, participate in our auctions. Bid on tickets and secure your spot at the hottest shows.
)} {/* You can add content for the other tabs here if needed */}

Your Safety is Our Priority
